title: From the Grave
description: The final breathtaking installment of the New York Times bestselling Arcana Chronicles Series by Kresley Cole. . . . To defeat the Emperor and Fortune, Evie, the great Empress of Arcana, has united with a sea witch, a band of roving warriors, and more than a couple of rogues. But can her unusual alliance defeat an unimaginable evil? Or will blood and hellfire reign on earth forever? May the best hand win. . . .
author: Kresley Cole
